titles.title: Chimp Sanctuary Act
Chimp Sanctuary Act
A bill to prohibit the housing of chimpanzees at installations of the Department of the Air Force.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Chimp Sanctuary Act
This bill prohibits the housing of chimpanzees at any Air Force installation. Any chimpanzees currently housed at an Air Force installation must be transferred to Chimp Haven in Louisiana.
